<JD_START>
Job Title: Napa Valley Restaurant Seeks Talented Chef!

Location: Napa, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Detailed description

This is your golden opportunity to train under a dynamic Executive Chef who believes in hands-on learning. And the best part? You'll be doing it all in the stunning backdrop of Napa Valley, California.

Picture yourself honing your culinary skills under the guidance of a seasoned professional, gaining invaluable knowledge and expertise along the way. But that's not all – during your time off, explore the wonders of San Francisco, visit picturesque beaches, and discover the countless attractions this incredible region has to offer.

This is a chance like no other, where your passion for food meets the thrill of exploration. Don't let it slip away! Apply now and embark on this unforgettable journey in the heart of Napa Valley.

Placement Remarks

Benefits

A Chef Jacket and apron is offered. You will be required to bring your own dark pants, slip resistant black shoes, and your own knives and utensils to operate a station.

A daily complimentary staff meal is offered.

The restaurant assists with finding housing and no need to get a car or moped as long as they are happy to walk or co share transportation. You MUST reach out to chef Sean before arriving to coordinate and to see if there is housing available. HRC will connect you with a current J1 candidate in the area prior to your arrival.

Candidate will train during the AM and PM shifts.

Salary

Rate Of Pay

$18.00/hour, may increase based on experience.

Local attractions

Housing

The average 1-bedroom apartment in Napa, California costs around $2,000/month. Home-sharing is recommended to help lower the cost of their monthly housing (roomies). Please note, that without established credit, your first and last month’s rent may be required as a deposit. HRC recommends you arrive with $5,000+ as startup capital and to help secure housing. You can check Spareroom, Hotpads, Forrent or Zillow

Transportation

Traveling around Napa Valley can be a challenge depending on where you are living. You may need a car during your time here. Remember to consider the cost of purchasing a vehicle and vehicle insurance. On average, a J-1 participant can expect to pay upwards of $400 on a used car payment per month and $150.00 per month for vehicle insurance. That being said, there is a modest bus system that goes around Napa called The VINE.

Climate

See climate and weather info here.

Local Attractions

Napa Valley Skate Park, Skyline Park, Napa Valley Paddle, Napa Valley Balloons, Discovery Kingdom, Wine Country Trekking, Napa Valley Film Festival.

Details

Torc

Napa Valley

June 3, 2024

Chef - Commis Chef - Chef de Partie

18.00 per hour

Once you click the apply button, one of our wonderful career consultants will be notified of your interest in this position and will get back to you within two business days. When you qualify for the placement, the next step will be an introductory call to see if we can meet your expectations.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
